title: Linear Transformation of Variables
question_text: The random variable $X$ is skewed left with a median of $10$ and IQR of $40$. The random variable $Y$ is defined by $Y=3X-7$. What are the median and IQR of $Y$?

choices.text:
The median is
23
and the IQR is
33
.

The median is
23
and the IQR is
113
.

The median is
23
and the IQR is
120
.

The median is
30
and the IQR is
113
.

The median is
30
and the IQR is
120
.
